entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Boisbriand
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:53 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow or rain. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Rain changing to periods of snow and blowing snow this evening. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6.
